name: GlobalMojo
overview:
We offer a browser app that empowers users to effortlessly support their favorite cause online.

Allow us to formally introduce ourselves. We’re GlobalMojo (hi!), a cause-marketing tech company that strongly believes profitability and corporate responsibility should work hand-in-hand.

Harnessing the incredible powers of technology, we’ve developed a browser app that revolutionizes online fundraising while simultaneously growing sales for businesses. It’s called the Giving Assistant.

The Giving Assistant enables socially conscious consumers to raise money for their favorite nonprofit through online shopping. Best of all, it doesn’t cost them a penny!

How is this possible, you ask?

First, supporters download their favorite nonprofit’s Giving Assistant (Take a peak: http://poweredby.globalmojo.com/jamieoliversfoodfoundation/ )

Next, we partner with hundreds of online retail websites (like Staples, Bestbuy, and Overstock), and the Giving Assistant identifies these websites when users are searching and shopping online.

Lastly, when users purchase from partner websites, we receive a referral commission that we split with the users’ nonprofit.

It’s automatic and effortless! Fundraising for a cause has never been so easy.
